Product Title: UV LED Nail Lamp – 128W Rapid-Curing Gel Nails Dryer for Manicures and Pedicures – Dual-Voltage with Extra-Long Cable, Multi-Language Manual – Professional Gel Lamp for Homes or Salons by OVLUX, Gold
Review Date: 2020/12/02
Store: OVLUX
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'OVLUX', 'Special Feature': 'Energy Efficient', 'Light Source Type': 'LED', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Connectivity Technology': 'USB', 'Package Dimensions': '9.4 x 8.3 x 4.3 inches; 1.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '765453999881'}
Review Text: This nail lamp is stunning. I love the finish and the gold color. It has a nice weight to it, it does not feel cheap it works fantastically, and you can also take off the bottom if you'd like to use it for a pedicure. I definitely recommend this nail lamp it is not only great but beautiful as well. A definite eye catcher.
Review Title: The beautifulest of them all
Rating: 5.0

lootaan 500 Pieces False Nails French Acrylic Fake Nails Tips Half Cover Artificial Fake Nails With Box and False Nail Clipper for Women Girl
lootaan
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'lootaan', 'Number of Pieces': '500', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '710157699223'}
These are the longest nail tips I own. They are long and sturdy and they fit bigger nail beds. I compared them to other nail tips I have and these are bigger, i definitely recommend for people with bigger nail beds.
Long and Sturdy
20pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool
tiggell
{'Size': '20 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'Tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Package Dimensions': '8.98 x 6.85 x 2.2 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'UPC': '795853588163'}
I LOVE working on polygel, however whenever i use dual forms they tend to pop up and it makes it hard to hold down while putting my finger into the lamp so i decided to try these out. I have yet to use polygel with them but they hold pretty good with a full cover nail on top of my natural nail. I definitely recommend these for beginners who struggle with dual forms.
Great clips for polygel

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user maintains a strong inclination towards nail care and beauty products, with a particularly enthusiastic interest in tools that assist in nail enhancements and enhancing user experience.
  
- **Material Preference:** Continues to favor acrylic products for their durability and quality, while appreciating diverse materials such as plastics and gel components for specific applications.

- **Size Consideration:** Prioritizes larger sizes and products that accommodate bigger nail beds, indicative of a commitment to inclusivity and comfort in fit.

- **Rating Behavior:** Consistently leaves positive feedback, as evidenced by a recent 5-star rating highlighting satisfaction with a nail lamp. This underscores an appreciation for both functionality and aesthetic appeal. 

- **Usage Context:** Engages regularly with beauty products, particularly in nail enhancements, illustrating a hands-on approach that includes innovative techniques and tools.

- **Recommendation Tendencies:** Openly recommends products that impress, especially those that combine functionality with unique benefits, such as aesthetic design and performance efficiency.

Overall, this user demonstrates a clear preference for high-quality, visually appealing beauty products that cater to diverse needs. Their latest interaction reflects a continued interest in tools that not only enhance the nail care process but also add beauty and elegance to their collection.
